creator: eeproperty SA
descriptionHtml:
L'application Vesta® vous permet d'utiliser le service de buanderie Vesta® fourni par eeproperty SA de manière confortable sur votre smartphone !

• Approvisionnez votre compte
Plus de crédit sur votre compte ? Pas de soucis ! Grâce à l'intégration d'une grande variété de moyens de paiement (PayPal, PostFinance, PostCard ou carte de crédit), votre compte est approvisionnable en un tour de main.

• Consulter votre historique d'utilisation
Avec l’application Vesta, la consultation des dépenses liées à la buanderie est à portée de main.

• Identification aisée
Identifiez-vous une fois avec vos identifiants Vesta® et restez connecté. Aucun mot de passe à retenir.

• Disponibilité des machines
Plus de va-et-vient entre chez vous et la buanderie. Visualisez en temps réel les machines disponibles de votre immeuble.

• Planning des lessives
Le planning des lessives offre un maximum de flexibilité pour la réservation et la gestion de vos plages horaires.

NOTE : l’application est exclusivement disponible pour les utilisateurs disposant d’un accès aux services Vesta® dans leur buanderie.

descriptionShort: Application for using the Vesta laundry service from eeproperty SA.
title: Vesta

creator: eeproperty SA
descriptionHtml:
The Vesta® application allows you to use the Vesta® laundry service provided by eeproperty Ltd. comfortably on your smartphone!

- Top up your account
No more credit on your account? No worries! Thanks to the integration of a wide variety of payment methods (PayPal, PostFinance, PostCard or credit card), your account can be topped up in no time at all.

- View your usage history
With the Vesta application, the consultation of laundry expenses is at your fingertips.

- Easy identification
Identify yourself once with your Vesta® credentials and stay connected. No password to remember.

- Machine availability
No more back and forth between your home and the laundry room. Visualize in real time the available machines in your building.

- Laundry planning
The laundry schedule offers maximum flexibility in booking and managing your time slots.

NOTE: the application is exclusively available for users with access to Vesta® services in their laundry room.

descriptionShort: Application for the use of Vesta laundry service by eeproperty Ltd.
title: Vesta

creator: eeproperty SA
descriptionHtml:
SIMPLY THE DAILY ROUTINE

eeproperty is your building's wallet.

Your building has various services available in its shared spaces, such as your collective laundry room or the electric vehicle charging stations in your parking lot.

We connect the devices in your building's shared spaces to your user account for easy use.

You have a balance in your account that you can top up as you wish. This balance is intended for the use of your building's services.


THE USE

From your smartphone, you can top up your user balance by the following means: credit card (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), e-banking, PostFinance, PayPal or by payment slips.

You can check the availability of the equipment (washing machines or charging stations for electric vehicles) in real time and reserve them*. After your use, the balance of your account is automatically debited.

You can also automate the top up of your balance for a specific amount when it is depleted, using the "Automatic top up" function.


OUR SERVICES

Vesta® : Management and payment solution for collective laundries

Check the availability of machines from your smartphone. Then go to the laundry room and activate the machine from the touch screen located near the machines, by typing your personal code, given to you when you registered. Once the wash cycle is completed, your balance is debited automatically.


Volta®: Management and payment solution for electric vehicle charging

From your smartphone, you can check the availability of charging stations. You then activate the chosen station directly from the parking lot via Bluetooth or with an RFID card given to you when you register. Once the charging is completed, your balance is automatically debited.


THE FEATURES

- Check the availability of the devices in real time.
- Top up your account balance online or by ISR.
- Be debited automatically after your uses.
- Automatically top up your balance when it runs out.
- Instantly access your usage and transaction history.
- View the service schedule (optional) *.
- Reserve a time slot to use a service (optional) *

*The scheduling and reservation feature is only available if your building owner chooses to activate it.


FULL COMPATIBILITY

Your user account and balance are compatible with all eeproperty services. They can be used for both the Vesta® laundry service and the Volta® electric vehicle charging service, as well as all those to come...

We sincerely hope that our solution will simplify your daily life a little more, because we want you to be able to use your time for what really matters to you.

So don't wait any longer, install our application!


NOT YET INSTALLED IN YOUR HOME?

Our services are currently not available at your address and you would be interested in installing our solution in your building?

Send us a message with the subject "install eeproperty in my home" to contact@eeproperty.com indicating your full name, your complete address as well as the name and contact information of your property management company.

By sending us this message, you authorize us to inform the person responsible for your building of your interest.

descriptionShort: Easily use and pay for services in your building.
title: eeproperty

creator: eeproperty SA
descriptionHtml:
SIMPLY THE DAILY ROUTINE

eeproperty is your building's wallet.

Your building has various services available in its shared spaces, such as your collective laundry room or the electric vehicle charging stations in your parking lot.

We connect the devices in your building's shared spaces to your user account for easy use.

You have a balance in your account that you can top up as you wish. This balance is intended for the use of your building's services.


THE USE

From your smartphone, you can top up your user balance by the following means: credit card (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), e-banking, PostFinance, TWINT, PayPal or by payment slips.

You can check the availability of the equipment (washing machines or charging stations for electric vehicles) in real time and reserve them*. After your use, the balance of your account is automatically debited.

You can also automate the top up of your balance for a specific amount when it is depleted, using the "Automatic top up" function.


OUR SERVICES

Vesta® : Management and payment solution for collective laundries

Check the availability of machines from your smartphone. Then go to the laundry room and activate the machine from the touch screen located near the machines, by typing your personal code, given to you when you registered. Once the wash cycle is completed, your balance is debited automatically.


Volta®: Management and payment solution for electric vehicle charging

From your smartphone, you can check the availability of charging stations. You then activate the chosen station directly from the parking lot via Bluetooth or with an RFID card given to you when you register. Once the charging is completed, your balance is automatically debited.


THE FEATURES

- Check the availability of the devices in real time.
- Top up your account balance online or by ISR.
- Be debited automatically after your uses.
- Automatically top up your balance when it runs out.
- Instantly access your usage and transaction history.
- View the service schedule (optional) *.
- Reserve a time slot to use a service (optional) *

*The scheduling and reservation feature is only available if your building owner chooses to activate it.


FULL COMPATIBILITY

Your user account and balance are compatible with all eeproperty services. They can be used for both the Vesta® laundry service and the Volta® electric vehicle charging service, as well as all those to come...

We sincerely hope that our solution will simplify your daily life a little more, because we want you to be able to use your time for what really matters to you.

So don't wait any longer, install our application!


NOT YET INSTALLED IN YOUR HOME?

Our services are currently not available at your address and you would be interested in installing our solution in your building?

Send us a message with the subject "install eeproperty in my home" to contact@eeproperty.com indicating your full name, your complete address as well as the name and contact information of your property management company.

By sending us this message, you authorize us to inform the person responsible for your building of your interest.

descriptionShort: Easily use and pay for services in your building.
title: eeproperty

creator: eeproperty SA
descriptionHtml:
SIMPLY THE DAILY ROUTINE

eeproperty is your building's wallet.

Your building has various services available in its shared spaces, such as your collective laundry room or the electric vehicle charging stations in your parking lot.

We connect the devices in your building's shared spaces to your user account for easy use.

You have a balance in your account that you can top up as you wish. This balance is intended for the use of your building's services.


THE USE

From your smartphone, you can top up your user balance by the following means: credit card (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, UnionPay), e-banking, PostFinance, TWINT, WeChat Pay, PayPal or by QR-bill.

You can check the availability of the equipment (washing machines or charging stations for electric vehicles) in real time and reserve them*. After your use, the balance of your account is automatically debited.

You can also automate the top up of your balance for a specific amount when it is depleted, using the "Automatic top up" function.


OUR SERVICES

vesta® : Management and payment solution for collective laundries

Check the availability of machines from your smartphone. Then go to the laundry room and activate the machine from the touch screen located near the machines, by typing your personal code, given to you when you registered. Once the wash cycle is completed, your balance is debited automatically.


volta®: Management and payment solution for electric vehicle charging

From your smartphone, you can check the availability of charging stations. You then activate the chosen charging station directly from the parking lot using an RFID card. Once the charging is completed, your balance is automatically debited.


THE FEATURES

- Check the availability of the devices in real time.
- Top up your account balance online or by QR-bill.
- Be debited automatically after your uses.
- Automatically top up your balance when it runs out.
- Instantly access your usage and transaction history.

*The scheduling and reservation feature is only available if your building owner chooses to activate it.


FULL COMPATIBILITY

THE USE

title:

0.2.1

creator: eeproperty SA
descriptionHtml:
SIMPLY THE DAILY ROUTINE

eeproperty is your building's wallet.

Your building has various services available in its shared spaces, such as your collective laundry room or the electric vehicle charging stations in your parking lot.

We connect the devices in your building's shared spaces to your user account for easy use.

You have a balance in your account that you can top up as you wish. This balance is intended for the use of your building's services.


THE USE

From your smartphone, you can top up your user balance by the following means: credit card (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, UnionPay), e-banking, PostFinance, TWINT, PayPal or by QR-bill.

You can check the availability of the equipment (washing machines or charging stations for electric vehicles) in real time and reserve them*. After your use, the balance of your account is automatically debited.

You can also automate the top up of your balance for a specific amount when it is depleted, using the "Automatic top up" function.


OUR SERVICES

vesta® : Management and payment solution for collective laundries

Check the availability of machines from your smartphone. Then go to the laundry room and activate the machine from the touch screen located near the machines, by typing your personal code, given to you when you registered. Once the wash cycle is completed, your balance is debited automatically.


volta®: Management and payment solution for electric vehicle charging

From your smartphone, you can check the availability of charging stations. You then activate the chosen charging station directly from the parking lot using an RFID card. Once the charging is completed, your balance is automatically debited.


THE FEATURES

- Check the availability of the devices in real time.
- Top up your account balance online or by QR-bill.
- Be debited automatically after your uses.
- Automatically top up your balance when it runs out.
- Instantly access your usage and transaction history.
